title: Fukushima radiation causes 100% infant deaths among Orca whales
subtitle: An alarming article based on extra-concept speculation and quotations falsely claimed that radiation from the Fukushima disaster had caused 100% of infants to die among Orca whales.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The radiation from the 2011 Fukushima nuclear disaster caused 100% infant mortality among Orca whales.
